alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 9:45AM EST until January 15 at 11:09AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .The Green River at Paradise and Calhoun is near crest and water levels are expected to gradually fall below flood stage late this week. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 386.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting today and is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 379.3 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
